name: E mais que tudo não quero morrer covarde
description: This piece represents a part of my work that is driven by the compulsion of filling all the spaces, all the blanks. The lines that interlace with each other forming the intricate plot of life. I’m obsessed with how many textures i can fit inside one another and i love how easily ink lets me explore that. I did this drawing in a really tense moment of the pandemic and spending my nights filling these figures brought me comfort.
